body.name: WK70C Rectangle One Piece Modern Toilet Dual Flush 0.8/1.6 GPF Elongated Square Comfort Unique Design, White 12"Rough-in
features: 🚽[Unique and eye-catching design]:The toilet with diamond cut shape adds unique visual appeal to the toilet, making it stand out from traditional round or square designs.
🚽[ Square button chrome color inside and black color outside] The special design button with two colors adds modern decor to the white toilet and your bathroom.

🚽[Full Glazing on All Pipelines]: The entire pipeline of Wonchael toilet covers is all-glazed for a smooth and seamless flushing experience. This all-glazed design ensures that waste passes through the pipes efficiently and hygienically, minimizing the risk of clogging or blockage.

🚽[UF Rectangular Toilet Seat]:The toilet seat cover is made of high quality UF material that is extremely durable and long lasting. It is resistant to scratching, fading and cracking, ensuring that it will stay in place for years to come.
🚽[Comfortable seating]: Rectangular toilet seat have a larger seat area than other shapes, providing more comfortable support during extended use.

🚽[Water-saving]: Dual-flush toilets have two flushing options to choose from - half-flush for liquid waste and full-flush for solid waste. This allows the user to choose the appropriate amount of water needed for each flush, resulting in significant water savings over traditional toilets.

🚽 [Standard 12" rough-in]. It doesn't fit 10" rough-in bathroom space. Please make sure the distance between finished wall and the fixing bolts. Make sure the product size is suitable for your current bathroom.
🚽[Big trapway]:The larger trapway allows for a more powerful and efficient flush, which helps to prevent clogs. It can handle a larger volume of waste and toilet paper without getting blocked.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wonchael WK70C Rectangle One Piece Modern Toilet

Wonchael Unique Square Toilet with Full Glazing on All Pipelines The entire pipeline of our toilet seat is fully glazed, providing a smooth and seamless flushing experience. This full glazing ensures that waste is efficiently and hygienically transported through the pipelines, minimizing the risk of clogs or blockages.

The rectangular toilet coming with UF hard material Toilet Seat Our toilet seat, made from high-quality UF material, offers exceptional durability and longevity. It is resistant to scratches, discoloration, and cracking, ensuring that it maintains its pristine appearance for years to come.

More details of Wonchael Modern Rectangular One Piece Toilet Powerful flushing There are many flushing ports distributed underneath the toilet seat, which can generate a powerful flushing force with a 360-degree no dead angle flushing. This design ensures comprehensive and thorough cleaning in every corner of the toilet, effectively removing dirt and contaminants. High water seal Inhibits Odors: High water seal toilets reduce the emission of odors by creating a higher water seal between the tank and the drain hole, effectively isolating direct contact between the waste and the exhaust pipe. This makes using a high water seal toilet more comfortable and provides better hygiene.Provides a better seal: high water seal toilets have a greater impact of the water jet formed when draining due to the greater height of the water seal, effectively flushing waste down. This design also reduces gas escape and provides a better seal Easy install toilet seat This type of cover comes with a quick release mechanism that makes installation and removal very easy and quick. It usually has a button that can be pressed to easily remove the cover from the toilet.Covers with pre-positioned pins: these covers are equipped with pre-positioned pins that are usually used in conjunction with holes in the toilet seat. Simply insert the pins into the holes and place the cover over the toilet and the pins will be fixed in place. Big trapway The larger trapway allows for a more powerful and efficient flush, which helps to prevent clogs. It can handle a larger volume of waste and toilet paper without getting blocked.With a toilet that has a larger trapway, there is a decreased likelihood of clogs and blockages. This means less need for plunging or calling a plumber to fix the issue, resulting in reduced maintenance and repair costs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Very nice toilet but
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this toilet a few months ago for my bathroom remodel, came promptly and in good packaging but the top piece has a chip in it. Hoping the company will replace it. Will update if anything changes.
